body_html:
That Note is certainly helpful, but maybe you can make it more prominent. Also: adding an explanation how to change this (how to also restore accumulators) might help (in particular in situations like the one I described when opening this issue).

In any case: Thanks a lot for listening to our feedback :)
body_text:
That Note is certainly helpful, but maybe you can make it more prominent. Also: adding an explanation how to change this (how to also restore accumulators) might help (in particular in situations like the one I described when opening this issue).

body:
That _Note_ is certainly helpful, but maybe you can make it more prominent. Also: adding an explanation _how_ to change this (how to also restore accumulators) might help (in particular in situations like the one I described when opening this issue).

In any case: Thanks a lot for listening to our feedback :)
